website_summaries.verdict: This craftsmanship that went into this bird bath is genuinely impressive, making it an eye-catching centerpiece in any home garden.
pros: Hand painted humming birds, foliage, and green backdrop
Bath and stand easily lock into place
cons: Secure the stand to the ground, as it may shatter if toppled

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Addition, Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to my garden. Several birds visit it daily as do the bee's, wasps, and other creatures.
customer_reviews.author: Sharifah C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Birdbath
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a nice pedestal birdbath for a long time. This Burley Clay Hummingbird Birdbath is just beautiful. I read many reviews before ordering and a lot of them said the packaging was insufficient and the birdbath arrived broken. I worried about that but when it was delivered I was pleasantly surprised to see just how well protected it was. I put it out in the backyard immediately and just love it. So do the birds.
customer_reviews.author: Not my real name

customer_reviews.title: These are initially beautiful bird baths
customer_reviews.text: These are initially beautiful bird baths. However, I have bought one in 2016 and then again in 2017 only to have the top portions break in half. The first Bird Bath In 2016 was probably my fault because I left it outside until Thanksgiving and the “ freeze/thaw“ caused it to break. However, the second one broke for no reason at all. They are made of clay and I suppose I should be buying something not as delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Scrappy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but breaks easy.
customer_reviews.text: The Bird Bath itself looks pretty good. However, within 2 weeks of my getting the bird bath, it toppled over in the wind and broke into 3 pieces. Needless to say, given how much I paid for the product, I am not happy that it broke within a few weeks. Shipping a heavy product back will be a nightmare, so I am going to try and see how I can fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Gshire

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for  breakage and falls
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of reviews that this broke easily. I usually dont pay attention to those kind of reviews because I know there are a lot of user error out there. I dont know how this fell off so easily but it did and now I'm so so sad because I love it so much! I have only had it for about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: NEVER AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: The bath is NOT easy to clean...it is NOT easy to separate the top from the base...it is NOT brightly painted...it is NOT winter safe as mine has cracked and I got NO REPLY from the seller at all.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Sousa

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bird bath with unique design.came in two pieces and was easy to put together. Height was was a bit small which is why I rated it 4 stars but overall quality and looks wise it met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: usmc85

customer_reviews.title: Too bad they still haven’t figured out how to package it.
customer_reviews.text: Grrrrr! Broken when opened it. And it was my Mother’s Day present! Really terrible packing. Ordered a return and replacement. Update new one came & not broken. Very little paint very dull so don't think it will look like picture!
customer_reviews.author: SlickDealer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty without being too cute
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a classic looking birdbath NOT in resin. I was initially looking for a simple unadorned one, but the person buying it with me really liked this, so we got it. I am really happy with it; the color fits in well with our flower garden, and it is very sturdy. The decoration is delicate and pretty without being cutesy. The only small issue is that I have difficulty removing the bowl; I turn it but can't get it to release. it's a minor matter.
customer_reviews.author: J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bird Bath for the money
customer_reviews.text: This birdbath is so pretty. The colors are just like the photo but the detail is so much nicer in person. The hummingbirds are ruby throated which is not very obvious in the picture. It is hand-painted and made in the USA which for me is a big plus. It was also priced very well. It arrived in excellent condition the third day after I ordered it. It was packaged well in Styrofoam and bubble wrap. I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Great bird bath. Great price. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Love this birdbath. I wanted a deep one, I have a lot of birds. This one is great. Last more than a day! The birds use it.
customer_reviews.author: S. geyer

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried with some of the comments talking about poor packaging, but I took the chance and ordered it. The birdbath came in a box with both pieces well wrapped in bubble wrap and stabilized in Styrofoam. I have zero complaints and my wife loves it. Beautiful bath for the back yard. I absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: crump

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t last three weeks. Mid-day, I looked out my window and saw that the bowl was on the ground and cracked in half and one of the halves had shattered in pieces. It was heavier than I thought it would be. I was never successful in removing the bowl to dump it. I don’t know how it happened to come off, but it should have been able to hold the weight of a squirrel or bird. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: I received the birdbath today It arrived in great condition, the packaging was done very well. I was very pleased with the fact that the dish part hooked on to the base and once it is turned off it locks it in place so it doesn’t fall off, but it can be removed to clean if necessary. Thanks My only disappointment is it is not as bright in color as it is shown in the picture. And some of the color on the side is rather washed off. This was the only real reason I only gave it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful bird bath! It is heavy enough that it can’t be knocked over by the wind when empty but not too heavy to lift it. The top is removable in order to clean it or empty it without moving the base but it’s not that easy to take off.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The bowl is deep enough to allow birds to bathe.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully decorated and packed very well for shipping. I like that the bowl is deep enough in the center to hold enough water to allow birds to splash about including the larger birds such as the Blue Jays. It is frequented by several species of birds and an occasional squirrel for drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bird bath. Packaged great to prevent breakage in transit. Impressed
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: quality control
customer_reviews.text: The bird bath was packaged well and the box had no damage when it arrived. After getting the bird bath out of the box we found a chip out of the basin rim. It appears it was packaged with the chip already there, fore we found no chipped piece in the box. We returned this item and will order another one just like it and hope it comes in one piece for it was quite lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: A nice touch for your garden
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive bath with a nice artisanal feel. The top does not secure particularly well to the base, but it's not going to fall off under the weight of a squirrel. At this price, I can definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Road Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Birdbath with panache
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful relief design and nice color. There are two changes only 1) I would suggest to somehow stabilize the top so it is level. I have to play around with the positioning to get it to level. 2) make the bath surface smooth for easier cleaning. Really a lovely addition and well used by the birds. Am glad to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bird bath. BUT you have to turn the top part upside down in the winter (unless you bring in) so the ice doesn't crack it when it expands...oops. The crack did not go all the way through, but I'm buying another to put in front of the house.
customer_reviews.author: selin nacar

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy glazing or paint job ....disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come broken like many others said did......BUT, it didn’t have a pretty green color like the advertised photo showed .....more of a pale PUKE green and the hummingbirds and flowers were VERY shoddily painted. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED 👎
customer_reviews.author: Kactuskween

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful way to remember our mother
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bird bath we purchased to place in the yard to honor our mother who passed away a couple of weeks ago. She loved hummingbirds, so this was a special way to honor her.
customer_reviews.author: collette

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have many birds where I live and have had all types of bird bathes. This ceramic bird bath is heavy and hand painted so it looks so pretty and will last. Add that it was prime, you can't beat it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy505

customer_reviews.title: Color not quite as pictured but a very nice bird bath
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence - 4 or 5 stars. The picture is quite green but the actual color is almost a greenish gray. Love it though. I think this is high enough to keep the birds safe from the neighbor cats and has a good depth.
customer_reviews.author: Simply Karen

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: This bird bath is beautiful! The paint is a little lighter than pictured but still just as beautiful can’t wait for summer to see the birds come!
customer_reviews.author: K.S_23

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I've had for a few weeks now and love how it looks in my garden! Seems very durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Not as pretty as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Isn't nearly as colorful as picture but is pretty. Very secure locking system for top and bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: my mom loves it. I got it for her ...
customer_reviews.text: my mom loves it. I got it for her for mothers day. I will order the cardinal one a little closer to winter
customer_reviews.author: karla Belcher

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty in my Garden
customer_reviews.text: So pretty in my garden! I didn't expect this bird bath to be so nice, it is very well crafted and heavy enough to not make me worried about it falling over. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Husband and I'd Anniversary! It is beautiful! The color of the flowers is more pink tho it looks lavender in the pic. Came well packaged and in great shape. One of our favorite Amazon purchases!
customer_reviews.author: SGM

customer_reviews.title: Great size of bowl
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful birdbath and luv the size of the deep bowl
customer_reviews.author: JLA

customer_reviews.title: Bird bath
customer_reviews.text: The bird bath is attractive and light enough to move around. Definitely recommend the solar fountain to help prevent residue in the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lovely
customer_reviews.text: So very pretty. I love this! A lovely addition to my new garden. I hope they are back In stock soon ... would love to order more to give to my friends who love their gardens (mom’s day, b-days, thank you gifts).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style
customer_reviews.text: I love the Burley bird baths and plant pots. They add such style and grace to my gardens.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Schuh

customer_reviews.title: very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: very beautiful its a little smaller than I would like but its very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sandrea Taliaferro

customer_reviews.title: Not as good green as the photo seemed but otherwise exactly as ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as good green as the photo seemed but otherwise exactly as expected. Have it to my mother for mothers day and she loves it. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bird bath
customer_reviews.text: I love my bird bath I received so many compliments a place a solar water fountain to give it that extra pop. Very sturdy very strong and very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: wandakbeasley

customer_reviews.title: Great Bird Bath!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bird bath. I wish the colors of the accents were more colorful.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well built
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this bird bath! It is beautiful and well built. Will consider buying more from this company. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this birdbath. I've waited a long time to purchase one. The price was good, the packaging was very good and it looks really nice in my yard.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stanz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Cracks
customer_reviews.text: Bird bath is quite lovely but basin cracked into many pieces during first winter in north Texas. Base is whole. It is a shame because the birds gave it lots of use last summer. Basin was subject to algae in summer but copper coil mostly solved the issue.
customer_reviews.author: PatSandy

customer_reviews.title: Bird Bath with Hummingbird Design
customer_reviews.text: This birdbath is even more beautiful than I anticipated. It is a good weight and looks absolutely beautiful in my rock garden amongst my plants. I live in the desert of Las Vegas and all must be in planters. The colors of the Hummingbirds would be the Ruby Throasted Hummingbird. It is truly a joy! The bath holds one gallon of water when full.
customer_reviews.author: A. J.

customer_reviews.title: quick service -- beautifully made -- MADE IN USA
customer_reviews.text: I love this birdbath -- I actually used for my mothers wake -- she loved hummingbirds so I ordered and then had the florist make a floral arrangement to set inside. the best part is she will always be with me when I put the birdbath in my garden
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Malsheske

customer_reviews.title: this a beautiful piece. not as shown tho
customer_reviews.text: this a beautiful piece. not as shown tho. there is virtually no color. so the salmon colored flowers in the pic. not there. still i really love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my bird bath in 2016 and while it is attractive, the surface is not smooth and is impossible to get clean.
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: The base is beautiful and artist signed
customer_reviews.text: Slight imperfections on the inside of the bowl, but holds water. The base is beautiful and artist signed!
customer_reviews.author: Sir Lancelot

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: It looks better than the picture and it attracts lots of birds. If I had a water source close to it, it would be much easier to keep clean and filled.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter D. Black

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought this
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful bird bath. Well worth the price. Packing was perfect. Can not say anything negative.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Not the best vale for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Inside of the top looked like it was done by a 10 year old. Expected better finish for the amount paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bird bath!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this bird bath. Packaging was a little damaged, but bird bath was perfect. Shipped on tuesday, received on wednesday. Color beautiful, top locks in place. Perfect!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna MARSHALL

customer_reviews.title: the top is hard to secure and fell off and broke first day.
customer_reviews.text: the base fell off on the first day I putit out and broke.. not very pleased with overall sturdiness
customer_reviews.author: Zach Perry

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday present for my moms garden and she absolutely loves it! It’s beautiful and well made!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this birdbath and so do the birds . . . I have very dirty birds though. Grandma
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: s pretty, but they way the top connects to the ...
customer_reviews.text: It,s pretty, but they way the top connects to the base is kinda cheesy. Got knocked off once.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sadorf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great birdbath.. Top screws onto the base so it won't fall off. Beautiful design!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this birdbath...it looks lovely. Gets a little yucky with the stagnant water...so it takes a little cleaning maintenance. Otherwise...thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bowl cleans up nice. of course birds love to bathe and crows softened their bread in the water.
customer_reviews.author: carol vanderwal

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured! Sturdy and looks great in my new little garden!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mason

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in mint condition, and looks Great set out on the patio. The rain fell yesterday and filled it nicely, and the birds found it already! I am very pleased. The bowl is nicely textured and the birds seem to appreciate that. And this is made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: PurpleDragon

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT ADITION TO OUR PERANNUAL BEDS
customer_reviews.text: A GREAT ADITION TO OUR PERANNUAL BEDS. PACKING WAS SUPERB! NOT ANY CHANCE OF DAMAGE THE WAY IT WAS PACKED. KUDOS TO THE ENGINEER WHO DESIGNED THIS PACKING.
customer_reviews.author: CARL 37027

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a wedding gift! It's lovely, and you can bet it's a gift that won't be duplicated!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Castine

customer_reviews.title: LOVE ITI
customer_reviews.text: I have recommended it to family members. The birds love it and I really enjoy watching them at the birdbath.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and very well made. Has withstood extremes in temperature no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie J

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on schedule unfortunately it's broken in multiple places😥
customer_reviews.author: L Chapman

customer_reviews.title: class...
customer_reviews.text: quality, first rate and worth the cost, would buy it again...
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: I love my bird bath
customer_reviews.text: I love my bird bath, however, like some of the other posters I would like both pieces to attach (the neighbor cats try to take a drink and it flips them everytime). The service was great! My feeder was here 7 days before promised :-) I am very happy with amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect birdbath.
customer_reviews.text: I love this birdbath. The colors are just as shown in the pictures. The size & weight are good, easy to move around. Since the base is hollow I did place an upside down planter pot inside the base to give it a little more stability. I like that the bowl portion has a smooth glaze for easy cleaning as well as it being removable. Great value. I am going to purchase another for my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: C. Futch

customer_reviews.title: Not only is this bird bath very nice to look at
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this bird bath very nice to look at, the birds love it. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: K reggae

customer_reviews.title: So enJOYing this!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the neatest thing! I love the colors, the hummingbirds, the flowers and vine on it and to top it off, the beautiful green color that blends in so well in our garden/meditation area. Perfect! Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: OOT
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this Birdbath SET for me for an anniversary gift as I am a birder. The listing was for a bird bath SET, comments were about top and bottom, but only the pedestal arrived. Who buys only a pedestal anyway? Packaging on the pedestal consisted of layers and layers of bubble wrap and cardboard, Nothing broken as other reported, just quite a lot of packaging, and NOT something I wish to recreate to send back. The pedestal looks nice, kind of short, but maybe the top would add height? Guess I will never know! To date the box, loads of packaging layers and pedestal sit in the foyer waiting for reassembly. Happy Anniversary gift. NOT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packed, arrived shattered into hundreds of pieces
customer_reviews.text: I expected that this ceramic birdbath would have been surrounded in bubble wrap or packed in a box full of styrofoam peanuts. Nope. Just two flimsy pieces of styrofoam, one at the top and the other on the bottom. Any jostling in transit and shattering is assured. My wife opened this birthday present and was quite upset, and I was embarrassed. The only funny part is that Amazon expects me to pack the pieces securely for return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Cary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful birdbath. It is heavy enough not to topple, has a glazed bowl that is easy to clean, and a wonderful color combination that looks great in my little garden. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: sauslin

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought, but good quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a bit bigger, but I guess I should have read the specs a bit better. Top part just sits on the pedestal, so we put it on a few level landscaping blocks
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Product OK - not overly exciting
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived in good condition. Was a little disappointed in the color. Was expecting soft green and got light brown. A Christmas present for daughter so I hope she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Linstead

customer_reviews.title: great birdbath
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and am so very happy with it. The birds love to splash and drink from this birdbath, and it cleans up well. Easy to fill, and so pretty to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann 57

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: Nice. The color is nice & not over powering. Very nice addition to the patio area. Really like the finish in the bowl. Easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this birdbath
customer_reviews.text: Love this birdbath. I was concerned that it was too green. It is not nearly as green as this picture. It is very light green. Beautiful in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This Bird Bath Set has nothing to put water in.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Sherman

product_meta.title: Burley Clay Hummingbird Bird Bath Set
product_meta.description:
Burley Clay bird baths are made from a unique blend of the finest clay in the southeastern Ohio mines. All baths details are hand painted. This set is a locking set, the bowl will lock into the pedestal. The bowl has a glazed interior.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Burley Clay Hummingbird bird bath pedestal is fulling painted from the hummingbirds to the leaves. Everything is hand painted so no two baths will be the same.
feature_bullets: Manufactured using a unique blend of the finest clay

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars169 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
